editorialNotes.standard: Adult colouring books are all the rage, and Colorfy puts a digital twist on this calming, meditative diversion. With images ranging from flowers to animals to famous works of art, you simply tap each section of the picture to fill it in with your chosen vibrant colour. Colorfy eliminates the need to stay within the lines—perfect for those of us with more creativity than hand-eye coordination—and saves your finished projects for sharing on social media.
editorialNotes.short: Colour your own illustrations and mandalas.
